typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		version as string,
		data as (title as string, paragraphs as (qas as (question as string, id as string, answers as (text as string, answer_start as string)[], is_impossible as boolean)[], context as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> squadtraindata
squadtraindata select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
